price: (Ragaan) shanessituu abaarsi Rabbii ishee irra haa jiraatu ‘yoo inni (dhiirsi ishee) namoota dhugaa jedhan irraa ta’e"  (jechuudha).
arabic: وَٱلۡخَٰمِسَةَ أَنَّ غَضَبَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡهَآ إِن كَانَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wal-khāmisata anna ghaḍaba al-lahi ʿalayhā in kāna mina al-ṣādiqīna
